"Wake Me Up" by Avicii - This song would be the perfect opening track to set the tone for a lively and energetic soundtrack. It's upbeat and catchy, and its lyrics of waking up and feeling alive would be perfect for a day filled with excitement and adventure.

"Eye of the Tiger" by Survivor - This classic rock song is known for its motivational and inspiring lyrics, making it the perfect choice for a scene where you're feeling determined and ready to take on any challenge. It would be great for a workout or study session, as it would help you stay focused and motivated.

"Happy" by Pharrell Williams - This song is all about spreading positivity and joy, which is exactly what you need when you're feeling bored. Its upbeat and cheerful melody would instantly lift your mood and make you want to dance along. It would be perfect for a fun day out with friends or a relaxing afternoon in the park.

"Uptown Funk" by Mark Ronson ft. Bruno Mars - This funky and catchy tune is sure to get you moving and grooving. Its energetic beat and memorable lyrics would make it a great choice for a dance party or a road trip. It would also be perfect for a scene where you're feeling confident and in the zone.

"All About That Bass" by Meghan Trainor - This song is all about loving yourself and being confident in your own skin. Its catchy and empowering lyrics would be perfect for a scene where you're feeling insecure or self-conscious. It would help you embrace your uniqueness and celebrate your individuality.
